headline.main: Fish to Submit War Resolution as a Test; Predicts Its Defeat in the House by 2 to 1

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 22 -- Representative Hamilton Fish of New York said tonight he would place before Congress next week a resolution to declare war against Germany and predicted its defeat in the House by more than 2 to 1.
abstract: Fish plans to submit war resolution to Cong; challenges Roosevelt to similar action; predicts 2-1 House defeat
snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 22 -- Representative Hamilton Fish of New York said tonight he would place before Congress next week a resolution to declare war against Germany and predicted its defeat in the House by more than 2 to 1....
